name: Vegan Gluten free Banana Bread - Grain free Carrot Banana Bread
description: Gluten free Banana Bread. Grain-free Flourless Carrot Banana Bread. No Gum, no Aquafaba. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free recipe. Soft Moist Banana Carrot Bread
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice or a mix if cinnamon and cardamom
1/4 cup coconut flour (, use 1/3 cup rice flour as sub)
2 tbsp or more dried fruit, chopped dates or chocolate chips
2  ripe bananas (, small to medium size, not too large)
1/2 cup non dairy milk such as almond milk
1 tsp lime juice or lemon juice (, use 2 tsp if omitting citric acid)
1 tbsp flax seed meal or chia seeds
4 tbsp sugar (, less or more depending on ripeness of bananas)
2 tbsp oil (, use applesauce to make oilfree)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a loaf pan with parchment. Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F (185 deg C).
recipeInstructions.name: Line a loaf pan with parchment. Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F (185 deg C).

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything under dry except carrots and set aside. Mix well using a whisk. Add carrots and lightly mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix everything under dry except carrots and set aside. Mix well using a whisk. Add carrots and lightly mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend everything under wet until smooth, Alternatively, mash the banana really well and mix in the rest of the ingredients until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend everything under wet until smooth, Alternatively, mash the banana really well and mix in the rest of the ingredients until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine dry and wet and mix in till just about combined into a thick muffin like batter. If the mixture is thin, add a tbsp more coconut flour or potato starch.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine dry and wet and mix in till just about combined into a thick muffin like batter. If the mixture is thin, add a tbsp more coconut flour or potato starch.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the thick batter to the lined loaf pan. Even it out using a spatula. Top with additional coconut or walnuts
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the thick batter to the lined loaf pan. Even it out using a spatula. Top with additional coconut or walnuts

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, test with toothpick from he center, it should come out almost clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, test with toothpick from he center, it should come out almost clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Let cool in the pan for 10 mins then remove from the pan carefully and let cool on the counter lightly covered. Slice when completely cool. Store on the counter for the day and refrigerated for upto 4 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Let cool in the pan for 10 mins then remove from the pan carefully and let cool on the counter lightly covered. Slice when completely cool. Store on the counter for the day and refrigerated for upto 4 days.
